title: The South Sea Bubble / The Cornhill Hustle

mechanism.hook: Promise of infinite returns from a mysterious, exclusive undertaking
mechanism.sting: Promoter collects capital and vanishes (Rug Pull) / Insiders sell at peak (Pump & Dump)
mechanism.psychology: Fear Of Missing Out (FOMO) + Social Proof (Herd Behavior)

source_title: Memoirs of Extraordinary Popular Delusions and the Madness of Crowds
quote: A company for carrying on an undertaking of great advantage, but nobody to know what it is.
